name: swash (working title)
description:
My latest prototype. Heavily being worked on. Often updated. Please leave your feedback below or shoot me a message.

LMB (Left Mouse Button): Slash
RMB (Right Mouse Button): Thrust
R: Restart
ESC: Free Mouse
F: Focus

Long press of LMB/RMB: Dash
Dash executed on ground: Grounded Dash
Dash executed in air: Flying Dash
Dash executed mid-swing: Delayed Flying Dash

Capsule Color meanings: Red: Hitstun, Pink: Recovery, Blue: Invul, White: Neutral
